metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2014:0289-1 -- Recommended update for hal
metadata.description:
This update for hal provides the following fixes and enhancements:
* Do not install a signal handler on the forked hal daemon before being able to properly handle it. * Allow disabling storage device probing by setting HALD_IGNORE_STORAGE to "yes" in /etc/sysconfig/hal. * Do not kill the child when it takes too long to probe devices, as it will only shutdown hald after the probe is complete.
